|stockos = Linux;;; |exp_if_types = none |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$ |default_ch = |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = AP699E5N3 |manuf_rev = .CT124-4 REV1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = FreshTomato-MIPS |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 01/10/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 886227335770 |ean = 4716659335771 |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00DWFPDNO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP699E5N3.CT124-4" and "REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|ASUS RT-N12VP B1|ASUS RT-N12 series}} :This router includes two fixed 5dBi antennas. Additional specs, per '''ASUS''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::179 cm (W) x 128 cm (D) x 28 cm (H)]] *Weight: [[Weight::275 g]] ==Links of Interest== *[https://dlcdnets.asus.com/pub/ASUS/wireless/RT-N12_VP/GPL_RT_N12_VP_30043763835.zip OEM source code GPL] ===Reviews=== *[http://club.dns-shop.ru/Владимир-123/blog/Обзор-маршрутизатора-ASUS-RT-N12VP/ On '''club.dns-shop.ru'''] ==Notes== {{SCollapse | OEM tty |
